Articles.Content:
Here is another historical aircraft for you. This time it the famous Avro Lancaster from WW2. I have to say that this build could have probably gone better but i still think it looks pretty good . The aircraft flyes like a jetfighter and takes off almost immedietly.

Here are some picks of it.

After peoples reguest i desided to give a shot at creating the bouncing bomb that was used to bomb german dams by first making it spin real fast and use that spinning of the sylindrical shaped bomb to make it bounce on top of the water till it hit the dam wall, sank and then exploded underwater cracking the dam wall and letting the force of the water do the rest . Unfortunetly my kspfied version of the bomb doesnt really work because everything else except for the intakes goes splash and desintegrates .

Here are some picks of the "bomb" in action.

Mods used: B9 Aerospace pack, Firespitter, Procedual wings mod.

Download link:https://www.dropbox.com/s/ugrvmuqplvt28fl/Kavro%20Lankaster%20%28dambuster%29%28armed%29%28flagless%29.craft?dl=0. (aircraft supplied will be flagless).

Oh and before i forget, i used one of those Revell 1:72 scale dambuster models that i built many years ago as reference for this build.

So i hope you enjoy this little aircraft ive made, and as i said it could look better but i gave it my best shot .

Edited October 19, 2015 by kapteenipirk
Bouncing bomb and dowload link added
Very nice. Always loved the Lancaster. Hey, you should try and make a working 'Bouncing Bomb' for it!

Looks great. Are you gonna put download links and a mod list? That's the sort of thing you need on the SCE.

The fuselage looks a little small compared to the wings. I don't know exactly what the real life lancaster looks like off the top of my head so I may be wrong.

A bouncing bomb can be made with lots of radial air intakes placed in spherical formation, just to spark some inspiration.

Well done. I like the cockpits and gunner areas. What mod do they use?

Happy Flying

YargJay9991

Thanks . Have to start developing a bouncing bomb for this then .

Bouncing bomb, mods list and download link coming up soon:wink:.
The post has now been updated, download link, mods list and the bouncing bomb added .
